title: Travel Questions
description: Learn how to ask practical travel questions at A2+ level.

steps.pinyin: dào shì zhōng xīn dà gài yào duō jiǔ?
steps.english_hint: How long does it take to get downtown?

steps.teacher: 這附近有推薦的景點嗎？
expected_answer: 這附近有推薦的景點嗎？
steps.pinyin: zhè fù jìn yǒu tuī jiàn de jǐng diǎn ma?
steps.english_hint: Are there any recommended attractions nearby?

steps.teacher: 請問哪裡可以買一日票？
expected_answer: 請問哪裡可以買一日票？
steps.pinyin: qǐng wèn nǎ lǐ kě yǐ mǎi yí rì piào?
steps.english_hint: Where can I buy a day pass?

steps.teacher: 如果迷路了，我應該怎麼做？
expected_answer: 如果迷路了，我應該怎麼做？
steps.pinyin: rú guǒ mí lù le, wǒ yīng gāi zěn me zuò?
steps.english_hint: If I get lost, what should I do?

steps.pinyin: zhè bān chē huì dào jī chǎng ma?
steps.english_hint: Does this bus go to the airport?

steps.teacher: 附近有可以換錢的地方嗎？
expected_answer: 附近有可以換錢的地方嗎？
steps.pinyin: fù jìn yǒu kě yǐ huàn qián de dì fāng ma?
steps.english_hint: Is there a place to exchange money nearby?

steps.teacher: 我想知道下一班車的時間。
expected_answer: 我想知道下一班車的時間。
steps.pinyin: wǒ xiǎng zhī dào xià yì bān chē de shí jiān.
steps.english_hint: I'd like to know the time of the next bus.

steps.pinyin: chē piào shì zài nǎ lǐ mǎi de?
steps.english_hint: Where did you buy the ticket?

steps.teacher: 你知道哪裡可以寄明信片嗎？
expected_answer: 你知道哪裡可以寄明信片嗎？
steps.pinyin: nǐ zhī dào nǎ lǐ kě yǐ jì míng xìn piàn ma?
steps.english_hint: Do you know where I can send postcards?

steps.pinyin: dào zhè lǐ yào bù yào huàn chē?
steps.english_hint: Do I need to transfer to get here?

review.summary: You practiced useful A2+ travel questions.
review.mission: Next lesson: Asking for help & small complaints.
